trans-unit.source: Provides the base functionality for reading data from resource files.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于从资源文件中读取数据的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: Resource readers are used to read a stream of data from resource files in a particular format.
trans-unit.target: 资源读取器用于从特定的格式中的资源文件中读取数据的流。

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface when you want to control the way in which a resource file is read (for example, if the resource file was written by using a customized <xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>) or if you are using a non-standard format or file type for storing resources.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要控制在其中读取的资源文件的方式实现此接口 (例如，如果资源文件使用编写的自定义<xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>) 或者如果你在使用非标准的格式或文件类型，用于存储资源。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceWriter>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, use the default <xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader> class, which reads resource information from binary .resources files, or the <xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader> class, which reads resource information from XML resource (.resx) files.
trans-unit.target: 否则，使用默认<xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>类，该类从二进制.resources 文件中读取资源信息，或<xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader>类，该类从 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件读取资源信息。</xref:System.Resources.ResXResourceReader> </xref:System.Resources.ResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: Closes the resource reader after releasing any resources associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 释放与之关联的所有资源后关闭资源读取器。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to close a network connection or a file, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法关闭网络连接或文件，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: Returns a dictionary enumerator of the resources for this reader.
trans-unit.target: 为此读取器返回的资源的字典枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Because <xref:System.Resources.IResourceReader> inherits the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, it must also provide an implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, which returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to enumerate a collection.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Resources.IResourceReader>继承<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口，它还必须提供的实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，它返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可用于枚举集合的对象。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Resources.IResourceReader>

trans-unit.source: Typically, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is implemented as an explicit interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>实现作为显式接口实现。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A dictionary enumerator for the resources for this reader.
trans-unit.target: 此读取器的资源字典枚举数。
